---
title: "Fitting O/D-RAPM Model"
format: pdf
---

```{r, load_packages}
library('glmnet')
library('tidyverse')
```

Load the design matrix
```{r, load_data}
design <- read_csv('design_matrices/odrapm_design.csv')
design$...1 <- NULL
design %>% as.matrix() -> design

read_csv('data/processed_data_2022.csv')['PM'] %>% as.matrix() -> pm
```

Fit a GLM model. Set shrinkage for signed intercept to 0.
```{r}
cvfit <- glmnet(
    design, pm, 
    alpha=0, 
    intercept=FALSE, 
    penalty.factor=c(0, rep(1, 432)),
    nlambda=400,
    lambda.min.ratio=0.001
)

```

Extract coefficients
```{r}
coef(cvfit) %>%
    as.matrix() -> coefs

write.csv(coefs, 'results/coefficients.csv')
```
